description: Ha Ha Ha or Ho Ho Ho are pretty common ways to express the sound of laughing. These text faces all have these sounds somehow incorporated into them. The text is always fancy letters, as English letters don’t look all that funny. Be sure to use laughing mouths that are all open, like ꇴ, ∀, and ᗢ. ꉂ (ᵔ̴̶̤᷄ꇴ ॣᵔ̴̶̤᷅⌯))л̵ʱªʱª⁎*.＊ Σ(꒪ॢ∀꒪;)՞л̵ʱªʱª ꉂ ꀞꀞꀞ(ᕑᗢूᓫ∗)˒˒ ꉂ (๑¯ਊ¯)σ л̵ʱªʱªʱª ʱªʱªʱª (ᕑᗢूᓫ∗) (๑ॢ˃̶͈̀ ꇴ ˂̶͈́๑ॢ) л̵ʱªʱªʱª ｰΣ(꒪ॢ∀꒪;)՞л̵ʱªʱª (˃̴̀ᄇॢ˂̴́ ∗)੭᷅ʊʊ (‾͈̑ ◟  ॢ‾͈̑๑)ഽ̵ᵘഽ̵ᵘ४꒰ ꒱ (๑ ˃̵͈́∀˂̵͈̀ )ʊʊ ꉂ (ᵔ̴̶̤᷄ꇴ ॣᵔ̴̶̤᷅⌯))л̵ʱªʱª⁎*.＊
title: Words and Sounds
